title: Typography
summary: Our typography guidelines outline how to use font styles, sizes,  and weights effectively across different elements, from headings  and body text to small UI details.

columns.text: Typography plays a crucial role in shaping the look and feel of our design. It not only impacts readability but also helps establish a consistent visual identity, guiding users through content with clarity  and hierarchy.
By maintaining consistency in typography, we create a cohesive user experience that enhances communication, reinforces brand identity, and improves overall design aesthetics.
Our typography guidelines outline how to use font styles, sizes,  and weights effectively across different elements, from headings  and body text to small UI details.
